alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 3:34AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown, southwestern Horry and south central Marion Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 334 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plantersville, or 13 miles west of Murrells Inlet, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, Georgetown, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Horry, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Adrian, Pee Dee Crossroads, Oatland, Nixonville and Bucksport. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 13. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry
